name: Untitled Glowing Game
description:
Just don't try to rage (cuz I know you will)

Controls

WASD or Arrow keys to move

Left mouse button to shoot

How to play

Shoot at the glowing orange rectangle so that it bounces and hits you and give you extra time

If the time runs out then better luck next time.

Credits

Programmer and level designer: MD Sabit Junaid

Music by: https://opengameart.org/users/iamoneabe  and https://opengameart.org/users/zane-little-music

Art by: https://maaot.itch.io/

PS: I am a 12 year old
